cards.name: Akroma's Vengeance
cards.text:
Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: "Many must die for the one who should not have perished."

cards.name: Chainer's Edict
cards.text:
Target player sacrifices a creature.
Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Chameleon Colossus
cards.text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)
Protection from black
{2}{G}{G}: Chameleon Colossus gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

cards.name: Char
cards.text: Char deals 4 damage to target creature or player and 2 damage to you.
cards.flavor: Izzet mages often acquire their magic reagents from dubious sources, so the potency of their spells is never predictable.

cards.name: Cruel Ultimatum
cards.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature, discards three cards, then loses 5 life. You return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, draw three cards, then gain 5 life.
cards.flavor: There is always a greater power.

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"Leshrac, my liege, grant me the power I am due."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

cards.name: Fact or Fiction
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

cards.name: Fyndhorn Elves
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: "We could no more abandon the forest than the stars could abandon the night sky."

cards.name: Gilded Lotus
cards.text: {T}: Add three mana of any one color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Over such beauty, wars are fought. With such power, wars are won.

cards.name: Green Sun's Zenith
cards.text: Search your library for a green creature card with converted mana cost X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Shuffle Green Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
cards.flavor: As the green sun crowned, Phyrexian prophecies glowed on the Tree of Tales.

cards.name: Hymn to Tourach
cards.text: Target player discards two cards at random.
cards.flavor: The priests plead for your anguish and pray for your despair.

cards.name: Impulse
cards.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
cards.flavor: "You call it luck. I call it preparation."

cards.name: Ink-Eyes, Servant of Oni
cards.text:
Ninjutsu {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Ink-Eyes, Servant of Oni deals combat damage to a player, you may put target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
{1}{B}: Regenerate Ink-Eyes.

cards.name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
cards.text:
+2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.
0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
−1: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
−12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles his or her hand into his or her library.

cards.name: Kessig Wolf Run
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{X}{R}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +X/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor: When a werewolf changes for the first time, that first howl is said to echo through the wilds till moonset.

cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
cards.flavor: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

cards.name: Tangle Wire
cards.text:
Fading 4 (This artifact enters the battlefield with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player taps an untapped artifact, creature, or land he or she controls for each fade counter on Tangle Wire.

cards.name: Thran Dynamo
cards.text: {T}: Add {3} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Urza's metathran children were conceived, birthed, and nurtured by an integrated system of machines.

cards.name: Venser, Shaper Savant
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Venser, Shaper Savant enters the battlefield, return target spell or permanent to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: His marvels of artifice pale in comparison to the developing machinery of his mind.

cards.name: Wall of Blossoms
cards.text:
Defender
When Wall of Blossoms enters the battlefield, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Each flower identical, every leaf and petal disturbingly exact.
